A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Only rivaled in its poor execution by Spider-Man 3. Both of which I have only watched once\, because to me they are both such selfish diversions by their creators that there is just no room for a fan.\nTo me\, it's as if the creators sought to remove the formula and to drive away from the direction of the overarching story to create their own with their own rules.  Which is why Rian should never touch another property\, make your own next time.
